headline: Is Steel Dynamics’ Stock Surge in 2025 Justified by Recent Facility Expansions?
summary: Wondering if Steel Dynamics is truly a bargain or just riding the latest hype? You’re in the right place to get clarity, with a sharp focus on what really drives the stock’s value. Steel Dynamics’ stock has been on the move, up 2.1% over the past week and a remarkable 49.8% year-to-date. This is catching the attention of value and growth investors alike. Recent headlines highlight the company’s expansion into new steel production facilities and ongoing investment in sustainable...
